trans-unit.source: Represents a single filter entry.
The filter is used to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry"></xref> class with the specified catalog, schema, and name filters.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry"></xref> class the specified catalog, schema, name, and type filters, and filter effect setting.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate catalog or null to not limit by catalog.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate schema or null to not limit by schema.
The pattern to use to select the appropriate name or null to not limit by name.
The type of objects to apply this filter to.
An <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect"></xref> value indicating whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.
Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate catalog.
The Catalog part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
Gets the effect that this filter has on results.
An <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEffect"></xref> value that indicates whether to allow or exclude entries that match the specified filters.
Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate name.
The Name part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
Gets the pattern that will be used to select the appropriate schema.
The Schema part of the database name where the database name is formatted as Catalog.Schema.Name.
Gets the types of objects that this filter applies to.
An <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes"></xref> value indicating the types of objects to apply to the filter to.
